txt.en: <rgb=#FF0000>Completing Aiding the Eastemnet will cancel this quest</rgb>

'Though the southern half of Eaworth burns, we have held the remainder of the town. The Enemy desperately wants to see it turned to naught but ash. They march again upon our walls.\n\n'They must be driven back and the town must be defended once more.'
'For today, the town has been secured and the attack repulsed. Tomorrow will bring new battles, but now we rest.'
'Let me know when you are ready to join the battle.'\n\n<rgb=#FF0000>This is an instanced public questing area.</rgb>
Siege of Eaworth: Uruks of the Vale
The Uruk-encampment to the south of Eaworth launches almost daily assaults upon the town.
Uruks are besieging Eaworth.\n\nDernstan asked you to aid in defending Eaworth from the Uruks encamped to the south.
Dernstan is at Eaworth.\n\nDernstan will be pleased to hear that you defeated many Uruks while defending Eaworth.
